title: Constant in-game freezing
body:
For the last few months I've been having this weird in-game freeze where I can see what's going on around me but none of my keys work so I just basic whatever's in front of me and any spells I tried to use in that time go off afterwards. This sounds like lag or bad ping. but my ping and fps stay relatively good throughout all of it only changing a few numbers apart like usual. I've contacted my internet provider and have even tried using a new modem and router, but nothing has changed and it still continues. I was wondering if there were any possible fixes I could try because it's not playable under these circumstances.

edit: i've also uninstalled and reinstalled league
edit: my internet provider is COX cable

**[LINK REMOVED]**

replies.body:
I had to remove the Netalyzr link because it contained sensitive information. The Netalyzr mentioned that your connection showed bursts of packet loss, which is what I suspected was causing this prior to checking out that report. I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in this issue.
